title: It's STUNNING but.... - Finalmouse Starlight-12
tags: Is this the best gaming mouse in the world?
description: Thanks to Secret Lab for sponsoring today's video! Check them out at   It's been hyped for months, and Finalmouse's latest Starlight-12 line-up is out, but is it really worth the anticipation and hefty price tag? Possibly, as it is one of the most expensive lines out there, but is it overall better than the mainstream options? David takes a peak.   Buy a Finalmouse Starlight-12 Phantom:   Buy a Logitech G Pro X Superlight:   Buy a Logitech G Pro:   Buy a Razer Viper Ultimate:   Buy a SteelSeries Aerox 3 Wireless:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS ---------------------------------------------------  0:00 - Does Finalmouse dislike you? 0:29 - Exterior first impressions 1:23 - Weight and size comparison 2:33 - Sponsor - Secret Labs! 3:00 - Build quality and overview 3:43 - Colors 4:06 - Additional mouse features 4:37 - Unboxing continued 4:47 - USB cable impressions 5:26 - Quality issues 5:50 - Button impressions 6:30 - DPI button and info 7:10 - Battery life 7:20 - Time to game! 10:20 - Complaints 10:33 - Final thoughts
